entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Québec
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:31 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -7.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Quebec Lesage Int'l Airport 10:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

Temperature: -7.1°C

Visibility: 48.3 km

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy or freezing rain. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to freezing rain before morning. Snowfall amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow or freezing rain. High zero.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to snow in the morning and ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
